i2i-kamui-fal-nano-banana-pro-edit.description: Nano Banana Pro Edit - Gemini 2.5 Flash Image model for intelligent image editing. Edit images using text prompts with support for multiple input images. Supports customizable parameters including prompt, image URLs, number of images, aspect ratio (auto, 21:9, 16:9, 3:2, 4:3, 5:4, 1:1, 4:5, 3:4, 2:3, 9:16), output format (jpeg, png, webp), sync mode, and limit generations. Perfect for image editing, style transfer, and creative image manipulation via Kamui Code ⭐⭐⭐

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the desired edit

image_url.description: URL of the image to edit

image_url2.description: Optional second image URL for complex edits

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the output image

sync_mode.description: Whether to run in synchronous mode

t2i-kamui-fal-nano-banana-pro.description: Nano Banana Pro Text-to-Image - Gemini 2.5 Flash Image model for high-quality image generation. Generate images from text prompts with support for customizable parameters including prompt, number of images, aspect ratio (21:9, 16:9, 3:2, 4:3, 5:4, 1:1, 4:5, 3:4, 2:3, 9:16), output format (jpeg, png, webp), sync mode, and limit generations. Perfect for creative image generation, concept art, and visual content creation via Kamui Code ⭐⭐⭐

prompt.description: Text prompt describing the image to generate

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the output image

sync_mode.description: Whether to run in synchronous mode
